name: clutchcut-desktop
description: Clutch Cut â€“ Desktop app til analyse af gameplay (Battlefield MVP)
author: Clutch Cut Team

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n VITE,TSC,ELEC -c blue,magenta,green "vite dev --port 1337" "tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json -w" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=1 wait-on tcp:1337 && electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:electron
